{{wikispecies|Mus musculus}}

===Etymology===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=はつかねずみ}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=はつかねずみ|二十日|tr1=hatsuka|t1=twenty days|鼠|tr2=nezumi|t2=rat, mouse}},<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> so named for the [[gestation]] period of roughly 20 days.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|はつか ねずみ|acc=4|acc_ref=NHK,DJR|y=i|dev=2}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{l|ja|廿日鼠}}, {{l|ja|鼷}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|はつか ねずみ|ハツカ ネズミ}}

# ''[[Mus musculus]]'', the common [[house mouse]]

====Usage notes====
{{U:ja:biology|ハツカネズミ}} The generic Japanese term for {{m|en|mouse}} or {{m|en|rat}} is {{m|ja|鼠|tr=nezumi}}.
